title: Vehicles Management
description: Tracks vehicle essential information, documents, and live/recorded locations. On-premise deployment for internal fleet management.
body:
This on-premise fleet management system centralizes vehicle information, including registration, service history, documentation, and location logs. Designed for businesses that require internal hosting and strict data controls.

  • Document uploads and versioning
  • Location logging (live & recorded)
  • Role-based access and audit logs

title: Employees HR Portal
description: Human Resources system that digitizes and stores employee records, documents, and history. Built for secure on-premise hosting.
body:
An HR portal that digitizes personnel records, stores signed documents, and tracks employment history. Emphasis on privacy and on-premise deployment for organizations with internal-only data policies.

Features include secure document storage, custom reporting, and role-based workflows for approvals.

title: Buildings & Sites Manager
description: Real-estate and site management system tracking building files, time-sensitive reminders, and location-specific metadata.
body: A property and site management tool for maintaining building records, lease documents, and maintenance schedules. Includes reminder notifications for inspections and lease renewals.

title: Night&Day (Mobile App)
description: A mobile app currently in development for both Android and iOS. Work in progress.
body: Night&Day is a cross-platform Flutter app designed for seamless experiences on iOS and Android. Current work includes authentication, local state syncing, and responsive UI tuned for mobile interactions.

title: Inventory & Asset System
description: College inventory system using a GraphQL API and MySQL with WebSocket-based live updates for real-time inventory and asset tracking.
body:
Built as a college project, this inventory and asset management app uses a GraphQL backend and WebSocket-powered live updates for changes to inventory counts, checkouts, and reservations.

It demonstrates real-time collaboration patterns and efficient querying with GraphQL.

title: Gestational Diabetes Tracking Assistant
description: A Flutter app for quick number tracking, CSV exporting, and filtered data views to assist gestational diabetes monitoring (college project).
body: This tool helps users log blood glucose readings quickly, export sessions as CSV for sharing with clinicians, and filter/view trends over time. Built with usability and quick data entry in mind.

title: Media Control API
description: Python-based API for programmatic media control and device management, built as a college project.
body: A lightweight Python API that exposes programmatic controls for media playback and device discovery on local networks. Useful as a centralized control layer for automation scripts and integrations.

title: Windows Toast LAN Messenger
description: Windows Toast and notification system enabling LAN messaging between devices for quick local notifications.
body: A small utility that sends Windows toast notifications across a LAN. Designed for quick local messaging without a centralized serverâ€”great for internal team alerts or small office broadcasts.

title: Public College Courses Projects
description: The work from my CSCI 031 college course, including web apps and tools built with modern technologies.
body: Aggregated course work showcasing web apps, tooling, and experiments. Includes examples using modern stacks like Next.js, Supabase, Prisma, and Turborepo monorepos.
